% !TeX root = ../main.tex

\newcommand{\addtodo}[1][] % {\addcontentsline{todo}{todo}{\protect\numberline{\thedefinition}#1}}

\newcommand{\CLEAR}{\clearpage}
\newcommand{\SPACE}[1]{\vspace{#1}}
\newcommand{\TO}[1]{\begin{todo}\ \begin{quote}#1\end{quote}\end{todo}}
\newcommand{\TOO}[1]{\begin{todo}\ \begin{quote}#1\SPACE{5ex}\end{quote}\end{todo}} % \addtodo{#1}}
\newcommand{\TOD}[1]{\begin{todo}\ \begin{quote}#1\SPACE{10ex}\end{quote}\end{todo}} % \addtodo{#1}}
\newcommand{\TODO}[1]{\begin{todo}\ \begin{quote}#1\SPACE{15ex}\end{quote}\end{todo}} % \addtodo{#1}}
\newcommand{\TODOO}[1]{\begin{todo}\ \begin{quote}#1\SPACE{20ex}\end{quote}\end{todo}} % \addtodo{#1}}
\newcommand{\TOODO}[1]{\begin{todo}\ \begin{quote}#1\SPACE{\fill}\end{quote}\end{todo}\CLEAR} % \addtodo{#1}}


\newcommand{\TODON}[1]{\begin{todon}\ \begin{quote}#1\SPACE{5ex}\end{quote}\end{todon}}
\newcommand{\TOLIVER}[1]{\begin{toliver}\ \begin{quote}#1\SPACE{5ex}\end{quote}\end{toliver}}

\newcommand{\defn}[1]{\uline{#1}}

\input{env/macros/letters}
\input{env/macros/categories}
\input{env/macros/functions}
\input{env/macros/custom}
\input{env/macros/arrows}
